biography.value:
Chris Seaman

A kobold inventor builds improvised weapons to gain an advantage in combat. These weapons last for only one or two attacks before they break and typically work only for the inventor, but they might be surprisingly effective in the meantime. The weapons don't have to be lethalâ€”often one serves its purpose if it distracts, scares, or confuses a creature long enough for the inventor to kill that foe.

description.value: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+4]]{+4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 ([[/damage 1d4 + 2 type=piercing]]) damage.
Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+4]]{+4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 ([[/damage 1d4 + 2 type=piercing]]) damage.
Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+4]]{+4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 ([[/damage 1d4 + 2 type=bludgeoning]]) damage.

The kobold uses one of the following options (choose one or roll a [[/r d8]]); the kobold can use each one no more than once per day:

  • @UUID[Actor.CQrkxsJOnZ6pV5FA.Item.hAEdAT2babm7Q56l]{1: Acid}
  • @UUID[Actor.CQrkxsJOnZ6pV5FA.Item.48zUGxUrT5frio0s]{2: Alchemist's Fire}
  • @UUID[Actor.CQrkxsJOnZ6pV5FA.Item.nLDkvdWcxOqqKp6u]{3: Basket of Centipedes}
  • @UUID[Actor.CQrkxsJOnZ6pV5FA.Item.UolNu5nuKsgoTDpL]{4: Green Slime Pot}
  • @UUID[Actor.CQrkxsJOnZ6pV5FA.Item.tR7rgZ1MyH3cUkg3]{5: Rot Grub Pot}
  • @UUID[Actor.CQrkxsJOnZ6pV5FA.Item.JDcO2JiC7cDLljH1]{6: Scorpion on a Stick}
  • @UUID[Actor.CQrkxsJOnZ6pV5FA.Item.PiWqCrMKKU3r5lH1]{7: Skunk in a Cage}
  • @UUID[Actor.CQrkxsJOnZ6pV5FA.Item.9JwMvl892u1nPxmv]{8: Wasp Nest in a Bag}
The kobold hurls a @item[acid (vial)|PHB|flask of acid]. Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+4]]{+4} to hit, range 5/20 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ([[/damage 2d6 type=acid]]) damage.

The kobold throws a @item[Alchemist's Fire (flask)|PHB|flask of alchemist's fire]. Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+4]]{+4} to hit, range 5/20 ft., one target. Hit: 2 ([[/damage 1d4 type=fire]]) damage at the start of each of the target's turns. The target can end this damage by using its action to make a [[/save ability=dexterity dc=10]] check to extinguish the flames.

The kobold throws a small basket into a 5-foot-square space within 20 feet of it. A @creature[Swarm of Centipedes||swarm of insects (centipedes)] with 11 hit points emerges from the basket and rolls initiative. At the end of each of the swarm's turns, there's a [[/r 1d100]]{50 percent} chance that the swarm disperses.

The kobold throws a clay pot full of green slime at the target, and it breaks open on impact. Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+4]]{+4} to hit, range 5/20 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ([[/damage 1d10 type=acid]]) damage, and the target is covered in slime until a creature uses its action to scrape or wash the slime off. A target covered in the slime takes 5 ([[/damage 1d10 type=acid]]) damage at the start of each of its turns.

The kobold throws a clay pot into a 5-foot-square space within 20 feet of it, and it breaks open on impact. A @creature[swarm of rot grubs|MPMM] (in this book) emerges from the shattered pot and remains a hazard in that square.

The kobold makes a melee attack with a @creature[scorpion] tied to the end of a 5-foot-long pole. Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+4]]{+4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a [[/save ability=constitution dc=9]] saving throw, taking 4 ([[/damage 1d8 type=poison]]) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Weapon Invention: 6: Scorpion on a Stick
Weapon Invention: 7: Skunk in a Cage

description.value: The kobold releases a skunk into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The skunk has a walking speed of 20 feet, AC 10, 1 hit point, and no effective attacks. It rolls initiative and, on its turn, uses its action to spray musk at a random creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a [[/save ability=constitution dc=9]] saving throw, or it retches and is &Reference[condition=incapacitated] for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that doesn't need to breathe or is immune to poison automatically succeeds on the saving throw. Once the skunk has sprayed its musk, it can't do so again until it finishes a short or long rest.

effects.name: Weapon Invention: 7: Skunk in a Cage

items.name: Weapon Invention: 8: Wasp Nest in a Bag

description.value: The kobold throws a small bag into a 5-foot-square space within 20 feet of it. A @creature[Swarm of Wasps||swarm of insects (wasps)] with 11 hit points emerges from the bag and rolls initiative. At the end of each of the swarm's turns, there's a [[/r 1d100]]{50 percent} chance that the swarm disperses.
The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't &Reference[condition=incapacitated].
While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (&Reference[skill=Perception]) checks that rely on sight.
